hometown.description: A Jewish suburb about 30 minutes outside of NYC. Fun fact: Robert Durst from HBO's 'Jinx' grew up here. It's a peaceful suburban area.

grandparents.story: Escaped war-torn Poland and the Holocaust during WWII, settled in the Bronx, NYC, and worked in a curtain factory before opening a Bodega (or candy shop).

generative_art.description: Creating art using code, primarily with P5.js.
generative_art.plotters: Recently started using plotter machines to physically create generative art drawings.

sports_activities.name: Boxing
sports_activities.description: Historian of the game and fan of boxers like Roberto Duran, James Toney, Miguel Cotto, and George Foreman.

family_relationships.heritage: Proud of Jewish heritage and family history of overcoming adversity.
family_relationships.wife_child: Expecting a baby boy in July 2025.

pet.name: Winter
pet.description: Black, white, and brown coat. Extremely smart and energetic, age 3.

career_projects.passion: Building things for creative people and solving challenging problems with AI.

nebula_ai_search.description: Developed an AI-powered candidate search that allows users to search by natural language inputs like job descriptions or resumes. This innovation disrupted traditional keyword-based and Boolean searches.

career_projects.skills_development: Self-taught through continuous side projects to explore new AI technologies and applications.
career_projects.motivation: Empowering creatives by building tools that help them share and monetize their work.

passions_philosophies.philosophy: Support others to create and build. Share and grow alongside them.
